title: Hanamaru’s Tale
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Mia-chan, Maru will tell you a story zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Not interested.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Once upon a time....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I said I’m not interested.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>There was a spaceship that drifted ashore on the earth. It came from another planet far, far away. Abroad was a newborn baby. The baby had come to live as one of us, as an earthling.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Heh, that’s just the main character of a very famous superhero comic in the States, isn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>The baby grew up rapidly at the Dragon Palace, a castle that is said to be located at the bottom of the ocean.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>1 billion years had passed, and the former baby came up to the surface world. Yet what they saw was a world ruled by the dinosaurs.... The age of mankind had long ended, and the once thought to be extinct dinosaurs had conquered the earth.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eeeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>A baby no longer, they went on to live happily ever after with the dinosaurs.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>No way! They didn’t end up living with humans!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru created this story to teach people that life is unpredictable zura. There are lots of lessons we can take from books, Mia-chan. So read a bunch, alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>If it’s something interesting like this, I’ll definitely read it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
